channel.title: Need help with more then 1 player online... READ
channel.description:
when i log into my server, and someone else trys to get on my server it'll kicks me. short and simple... it won't let more then 1 player on at a time...
Here is my error...
Test is signing onto server. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream. java:129) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream. java:182) at client.packetProcess(client.java:20424) at client.process(client.java:20410) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151) at server.main(server.java:91) Rune Unlimited[fatal] - exception Game saved for player Test1 Test1 disconnected.
Game saved for player Test Test disconnected.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2008, 03:58:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone help?

item.title: Need help with more then 1 player online... READ
item.dc:creator: @LKCTheReturn LKCTheReturn
item.description:
@LKCTheReturn wrote:

when i log into my server, and someone else trys to get on my server it’ll kicks me.
short and simple… it won’t let more then 1 player on at a time…

Here is my error…

Test is signing onto server.
java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed
at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream. java:129)
at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream. java:182)
at client.packetProcess(client.java:20424)
at client.process(client.java:20410)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:151)
at server.main(server.java:91)
Rune Unlimited[fatal] - exception
Game saved for player Test1
Test1 disconnected.

Game saved for player Test
Test disconnected.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 26, 2008, 03:58:09 PM[/size][hr]anyone help?
